overview: The story of Paul, a middle child who has always felt a little ignored by his family. Paul has often been overshadowed by his older brother, but he believes that all that will change at an upcoming family dinner. Paul has finally decided to tell his family that he is gay. He is unsure how his family will react, but he knows this will definitely be a big deal for everyone. In his mind, Paul can already picture all of the attention he is going to get, but when things start to happen differently, Paul is unprepared to let go of his 'big moment.'
title: It's All Relative
